mapper.select: SELECT t1.vendor_code, t1.vendor_name, t2.company_code, t2.company_name, t3.product_season_code, t3.product_season_name FROM s_pur_purchase_contract t LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t1 ON t1.vendor_sid = t.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t2 ON t2.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t3 ON t3.product_season_sid = t.product_season_sid WHERE t.purchase_contract_sid = #{purchaseContractSid}
